org.description: A verifiable education attendance with information from a verifying organization. Note that this is not a Verifiable Credential (VC).

ref.description: A external reference to a verification of the education attendance. Note that this may or may not be a reference to a Verifiable Credential (VC).

prov.description: A Verifiable Credential (VC) of the type HR Open EducationAndLearning.

1edtob3.description: A Verifiable Credential (VC) of the type Open Badge v3, as defined by 1EdTech ( https://www.imsglobal.org/activity/openbadges ).

1edtclr2.description: A Verifiable Credential (VC) of the type Comprehensive Learner Record v2, as defined by 1EdTech ( https://www.imsglobal.org/activity/comprehensive-learner-record ).

other.description: A Verifiable Credential (VC) of any type.
